thread.section_title: Suntransfers.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Suntransfers.com | suntransfers.com
thread.title: G T

author: G T
title: G T
text: Picked-up on time from Rome Airport in a most comfortable car and with a driver who was most welcoming and good humoured. Not alone was he the driver but he turned out to be a Tour Guide as he most kindly pointed out historic buildings to us en route to our hotel. The pick-up from our hotel on our return journey was on time and again in a most clean and comfortable car.
